lessons.title: Resource Life Cycle
lessons.description: Learn about the life cycle of resources, and the two types of scopes - Per-request and Singleton

lessons.title: Param Annotations and Member Variables
lessons.description: The Singleton annotation has an implication on Param annotations for member variables. We'll understand how that works.

lessons.title: ParamConverters
lessons.description: Understand what ParamConverters are and the role they play in the JAX-RS request.

lessons.title: Implementing Custom ParamConverters
lessons.description: Implement your own ParamConverter that converts from a String to a custom data type.

lessons.title: ParamConverters Review
lessons.description: Test your knowledge of what we've covered so far.

lessons.title: MessageBodyReaders and MessageBodyWriters
lessons.description: Learn what MessageBodyReaders and MessageBodyWriters are. Understand how they are different from the ParamConverters we've already learnt about, and when to use what.

lessons.title: Implementing a MessageBodyWriter
lessons.description: Implement a custom MessageBodyWriter to handle a Date object returned by a resource method.

lessons.title: Custom Media Types
lessons.description: Implement a custom media type and understand what it takes to get it working. Create a new MessageBodyWriter for your media type and verify that the right response is returned for the right media type.
